name: Zombie Shooter -BATTLE
description:
Zombie Shooter -BATTLE- is a game created by  me! Shoot through hoards of zombies! This is an HD remake of a Scratch game I made ! Go and have some classic zombie shootin' fun! This game is only for Windows 10. Designed for 1920x1080 HD screens. Automatically goes into fullscreen.

Credits---

Everything by me
